attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have spoken to many people about this issue and all give me the same answer.

The European Union is not a good idea for Britain. We lose over four billion pounds a year to the EU, and what do we get out of it?

Laws telling us we must open up competition when it destroys our post office and various other problems. We are literally paying to destroy our economy.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information. "Grant" is not a full name.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
